text: Arizona's 3rd congressional district is a district in southwestern Arizona. It is one of 9 districts in Arizona and one of 435 in the US. It has a CPVI of D+13, and is represented by Ruben Gallego. ==Voting== Election results from presidential races Year Office Results 2000 President Bush 54 - 43% 2004 President Bush 58 - 41% 2008 President McCain 57 - 42% 2012 President Obama 61 - 38% 2016 President Clinton 62 - 33% 2020 President Biden 63 - 36% == References == 03
title: Arizona's 3rd congressional district
